title: It's the only body you've got
creator_credit: Roslyn Simms, National Heart Foundation of Australia and Paul Griffiths Presentations
brief_description: Deals with the relationship between diet and heart disease. Outlines the risk factors which contribute to coronary heart disease and advises on correct nutrition and diet to minimise these risks. Especially designed for secondary school students.
creator_credit_for_label: Roslyn Simms, National Heart Foundation of Australia and Paul Griffiths Presentations
